```tsx
            /&amp;gt;
          &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;

          {/* Gender */}
          &amp;lt;div&amp;gt;
            &amp;lt;label htmlFor=&amp;quot;gender&amp;quot; className=&amp;quot;block text-sm font-medium text-foreground mb-2&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
              {t(&amp;#039;gender.label&amp;#039;)}
            &amp;lt;/label&amp;gt;
            &amp;lt;select
              id=&amp;quot;gender&amp;quot;
              name=&amp;quot;gender&amp;quot;
              value={formData.gender}
              onChange={(e) =&amp;gt; setFormData(prev =&amp;gt; ({ ...prev, gender: e.target.value }))}
              className=&amp;quot;w-full px-3 py-2 bg-background border border-input rounded-md text-foreground focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-ring transition-shadow&amp;quot;
            &amp;gt;

          &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;

          {/* Language */}
          &amp;lt;div&amp;gt;
            &amp;lt;label htmlFor=&amp;quot;language&amp;quot; className=&amp;quot;block text-sm font-medium text-foreground mb-2&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
              {t(&amp;#039;language.label&amp;#039;)}
            &amp;lt;/label&amp;gt;
            &amp;lt;select

              name=&amp;quot;language&amp;quot;
```

### `src/features/account/security/actions.ts`

```ts
&amp;#039;use server&amp;#039;;

import { db } from &amp;#039;@/lib/db-ws&amp;#039;;
import { sql, db as dbHttp } from &amp;#039;@/lib/db-http&amp;#039;;
import { sessions } from &amp;#039;@/db/drizzle&amp;#039;;
import { eq, and, ne } from &amp;#039;drizzle-orm&amp;#039;;
import { getSessionCookie } from &amp;#039;@/utils/cookies&amp;#039;;
import { revalidatePath } from &amp;#039;next/cache&amp;#039;;
import { parseUserAgent } from &amp;#039;@/utils/user-agent&amp;#039;;
import type { SessionInfo, LinkedProvider } from &amp;#039;@/features/account/security/types&amp;#039;;

export async function getSessions(): Promise&amp;lt;SessionInfo[]&amp;gt; {
  const sessionToken = await getSessionCookie();
  if (!sessionToken) return [];

  const result = await sql`
    SELECT 
      s.id, 
      s.created_at, 
      s.user_agent, 
      s.session_token
    FROM sessions s
    WHERE s.user_id = (
      SELECT user_id FROM sessions WHERE session_token = ${sessionToken}
    )
    AND s.expires_at &amp;gt; NOW()
    ORDER BY s.created_at DESC
  `;

  return result.map((row: any) =&amp;gt; ({
    id: row.id,
    createdAt: new Date(row.created_at),
    isCurrent: row.session_token === sessionToken,
    deviceInfo: parseUserAgent(row.user_agent),
  }));
}

/**
 * Get linked OAuth accounts (HTTP - simple read)
 */
export async function getLinkedAccounts(): Promise&amp;lt;LinkedProvider[]&amp;gt; {
  const sessionToken = await getSessionCookie();
  if (!sessionToken) return [];

  const result = await sql`
    SELECT DISTINCT a.provider
    FROM accounts a
    JOIN sessions s ON s.user_id = a.user_id
    WHERE s.session_token = ${sessionToken}
    ORDER BY a.provider ASC
  `;

  return result.map((row: any) =&amp;gt; row.provider as LinkedProvider);
}

/**
 * Check if user has password set (HTTP - simple read)
 */
export async function getHasPassword(): Promise&amp;lt;boolean&amp;gt; {
  const sessionToken = await getSessionCookie();
  if (!sessionToken) return false;

  const result = await sql`
    SELECT 1
    FROM user_secrets us
    JOIN sessions s ON s.user_id = us.user_id
    WHERE s.session_token = ${sessionToken}
    LIMIT 1
  `;

  return result.length &amp;gt; 0;
}

/**
 * Revoke a single session (WS - transaction)
 */
export async function revokeSession(sessionId: number) {
  const sessionToken = await getSessionCookie();
  if (!sessionToken) {
    return { success: false, error: &amp;#039;Not authenticated&amp;#039; };
  }

  try {
    const currentSession = await dbHttp.query.sessions.findFirst({
      where: eq(sessions.sessionToken, sessionToken),
      columns: { userId: true },
    });

    if (!currentSession) {
      return { success: false, error: &amp;#039;Session not found&amp;#039; };
    }

    // Delete session belonging to same user
    await db
      .delete(sessions)
      .where(
        and(
          eq(sessions.id, sessionId),
          eq(sessions.userId, currentSession.userId)
        )
      );

    revalidatePath(&amp;#039;/account&amp;#039;);
    return { success: true };
  } catch (error) {
    console.error(&amp;#039;Revoke session error:&amp;#039;, error);
    return { success: false, error: &amp;#039;Revoke failed&amp;#039; };
  }
}

/**
 * Revoke all other sessions (WS - transaction)
 */
export async function revokeAllOtherSessions() {
  const sessionToken = await getSessionCookie();
  if (!sessionToken) {
    return { success: false, error: &amp;#039;Not authenticated&amp;#039; };
  }

  try {
    const currentSession = await dbHttp.query.sessions.findFirst({
      where: eq(sessions.sessionToken, sessionToken),
      columns: { userId: true, id: true },
    });

    if (!currentSession) {
      return { success: false, error: &amp;#039;Session not found&amp;#039; };
    }

    // Delete all sessions except current
    await db
      .delete(sessions)
      .where(
        and(
          eq(sessions.userId, currentSession.userId),
          ne(sessions.id, currentSession.id)
        )
      );

    revalidatePath(&amp;#039;/account&amp;#039;);
    return { success: true };
  } catch (error) {
    console.error(&amp;#039;Revoke all sessions error:&amp;#039;, error);
    return { success: false, error: &amp;#039;Revoke failed&amp;#039; };
  }
}

```

```tsx
              &amp;lt;/svg&amp;gt;
            &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
          ))}
        &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
      )}
    &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
  );
}
```

```tsx
export function PasswordSection() {

  });

  // Cooldown timer effect
  useEffect(() =&amp;gt; {
    if (!cooldownEnd) return;

        setCooldownEnd(null);
        setRemainingTime(0);

        setRemainingTime(remaining);
      }
    }, 1000);

  async function handleCreatePassword(e: React.FormEvent&amp;lt;HTMLFormElement&amp;gt;) {
    e.preventDefault();
    
    // CRITICAL: Clear ALL previous messages FIRST before any async operation
    setError(null);
    setSuccess(null);
    setIsLoading(true);

    try {
      const formData = new FormData(e.currentTarget);
      const result = await createPassword(formData);

      setIsLoading(false);

      // Explicitly handle ONLY success or error, never both
      if (result.success) {

      }
    } catch (err) {
      setIsLoading(false);

      console.error(&amp;#039;[Password Create] Unexpected error:&amp;#039;, err);
    }
  }

  async function handleUpdatePassword(e: React.FormEvent&amp;lt;HTMLFormElement&amp;gt;) {
    e.preventDefault();
    
    // Client-side cooldown check
    if (cooldownEnd &amp;amp;&amp;amp; Date.now() &amp;lt; cooldownEnd) {
      return; // Button is disabled, no-op
    }

    // CRITICAL: Clear ALL previous messages FIRST before any async operation
    setError(null);
    setSuccess(null);
    setIsLoading(true);

    try {
      const formData = new FormData(e.currentTarget);
      const result = await updatePassword(formData);

      setIsLoading(false);

      // Explicitly handle ONLY success or error, never both
      if (result.success) {
        setSuccess(&amp;#039;Äá»•i máº­t kháº©u thÃ nh cÃ´ng&amp;#039;);
        setNewPassword(&amp;#039;&amp;#039;);
        setCooldownEnd(Date.now() + COOLDOWN_DURATION);
      } else {
        // Handle rate limit error with remaining time from server
        if (result.remainingTime) {
          setCooldownEnd(Date.now() + result.remainingTime);

      console.error(&amp;#039;[Password Update] Unexpected error:&amp;#039;, err);
    }
  }

  // Format remaining time to MM:SS
  function formatTime(ms: number): string {
    const totalSeconds = Math.ceil(ms / 1000);

  if (isCheckingPassword) {

          {hasPassword

        &amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
      &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;

      {!hasPassword &amp;amp;&amp;amp; !showCreateForm ? (

      ) : !hasPassword &amp;amp;&amp;amp; showCreateForm ? (

            &amp;lt;div className=&amp;quot;relative&amp;quot;&amp;gt;

                aria-label={showNewPassword ? t(&amp;#039;toggle.hide&amp;#039;) : t(&amp;#039;toggle.show&amp;#039;)}
```

### `src/features/account/security/components/sessions-section.tsx`

```tsx
&amp;#039;use client&amp;#039;;

import { useQuery, useMutation, useQueryClient } from &amp;#039;@tanstack/react-query&amp;#039;;
import { accountSecurityQueries } from &amp;#039;@/features/account/security/queries&amp;#039;;
import { getSessions, revokeSession, revokeAllOtherSessions } from &amp;#039;@/features/account/security/actions&amp;#039;;
import { useState } from &amp;#039;react&amp;#039;;
import { Button } from &amp;#039;@/components/button&amp;#039;;
import { MobileIcon, DesktopIcon, TabletIcon } from &amp;#039;@/components/icons&amp;#039;;
import { formatRelativeTime } from &amp;#039;@/utils/time&amp;#039;;
import { useTranslations, useLocale } from &amp;#039;next-intl&amp;#039;;

export function SessionsSection() {
  const t = useTranslations(&amp;#039;account.security.sessions&amp;#039;);
  const locale = useLocale();
  const queryClient = useQueryClient();
  const [showRevokeAll, setShowRevokeAll] = useState(false);

  const { data: sessions, isLoading } = useQuery({
    queryKey: accountSecurityQueries.sessions(),
    queryFn: getSessions,
    staleTime: 2 * 60 * 1000,        // 2 minutes - sessions can change more frequently
    refetchOnMount: false,            // Don&amp;#039;t refetch on mount if data is fresh
    refetchOnWindowFocus: false,      // Don&amp;#039;t refetch when returning to tab
    refetchOnReconnect: false,        // Don&amp;#039;t refetch on network reconnect
  });

  const revokeMutation = useMutation({
    mutationFn: revokeSession,
    onSuccess: () =&amp;gt; {
      queryClient.invalidateQueries({ queryKey: accountSecurityQueries.sessions() });
    },
  });

  const revokeAllMutation = useMutation({
    mutationFn: revokeAllOtherSessions,
    onSuccess: () =&amp;gt; {
      queryClient.invalidateQueries({ queryKey: accountSecurityQueries.sessions() });
      setShowRevokeAll(false);
    },
  });

  if (isLoading) {
    return (
      &amp;lt;div className=&amp;quot;animate-pulse space-y-3&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
        &amp;lt;div className=&amp;quot;h-20 bg-muted rounded-lg&amp;quot; /&amp;gt;
        &amp;lt;div className=&amp;quot;h-20 bg-muted rounded-lg&amp;quot; /&amp;gt;
      &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
    );
  }

  if (!sessions || sessions.length === 0) {
    return &amp;lt;p className=&amp;quot;text-muted-foreground&amp;quot;&amp;gt;{t(&amp;#039;empty&amp;#039;)}&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;;
  }

  const otherSessions = sessions.filter((s) =&amp;gt; !s.isCurrent);

  return (
    &amp;lt;div className=&amp;quot;space-y-4&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
      &amp;lt;div className=&amp;quot;flex items-center justify-between&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
        &amp;lt;div className=&amp;quot;flex items-center gap-2&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
          &amp;lt;h3 className=&amp;quot;text-lg font-semibold text-foreground&amp;quot;&amp;gt;{t(&amp;#039;title&amp;#039;)}&amp;lt;/h3&amp;gt;
          &amp;lt;span className=&amp;quot;px-2 py-0.5 bg-muted text-muted-foreground text-xs rounded-full font-medium&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
            {t(&amp;#039;deviceCount&amp;#039;, { count: sessions.length })}
          &amp;lt;/span&amp;gt;
        &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
        {otherSessions.length &amp;gt; 0 &amp;amp;&amp;amp; (
          &amp;lt;Button
            onClick={() =&amp;gt; setShowRevokeAll(true)}
            variant=&amp;quot;ghost&amp;quot;
            size=&amp;quot;sm&amp;quot;
            className=&amp;quot;h-auto py-1 px-2 text-muted-foreground hover:text-foreground&amp;quot;
          &amp;gt;
            {t(&amp;#039;revokeAll&amp;#039;)}
          &amp;lt;/Button&amp;gt;
        )}
      &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;

      {/* Info note when approaching limit (4+ devices) */}
      {sessions.length &amp;gt;= 4 &amp;amp;&amp;amp; (
        &amp;lt;div className=&amp;quot;flex items-start gap-2 p-3 bg-info/10 border border-info/20 rounded-md text-sm&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
          &amp;lt;svg className=&amp;quot;w-4 h-4 text-info shrink-0 mt-0.5&amp;quot; fill=&amp;quot;none&amp;quot; viewBox=&amp;quot;0 0 24 24&amp;quot; stroke=&amp;quot;currentColor&amp;quot; strokeWidth={2}&amp;gt;
            &amp;lt;path strokeLinecap=&amp;quot;round&amp;quot; strokeLinejoin=&amp;quot;round&amp;quot; d=&amp;quot;M13 16h-1v-4h-1m1-4h.01M21 12a9 9 0 11-18 0 9 9 0 0118 0z&amp;quot; /&amp;gt;
          &amp;lt;/svg&amp;gt;
          &amp;lt;span className=&amp;quot;text-foreground&amp;quot;&amp;gt;{t(&amp;#039;limitNote&amp;#039;)}&amp;lt;/span&amp;gt;
        &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
      )}

      &amp;lt;div className=&amp;quot;space-y-3&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
        {sessions.map((session) =&amp;gt; {
          // Determine device icon based on device type
          const DeviceIconComponent = 
            session.deviceInfo.device === &amp;#039;Mobile&amp;#039; ? MobileIcon :
            session.deviceInfo.device === &amp;#039;Tablet&amp;#039; ? TabletIcon :
            DesktopIcon;

          return (
            &amp;lt;div
              key={session.id}
              className=&amp;quot;border border-border rounded-lg p-4 bg-card hover:bg-accent/50 transition-colors&amp;quot;
            &amp;gt;
              &amp;lt;div className=&amp;quot;flex items-start justify-between gap-4&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
                &amp;lt;div className=&amp;quot;flex-1&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
                  &amp;lt;div className=&amp;quot;flex items-center gap-2&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
                    &amp;lt;DeviceIconComponent className=&amp;quot;w-5 h-5 text-muted-foreground&amp;quot; /&amp;gt;
                    &amp;lt;h4 className=&amp;quot;font-medium text-foreground&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
                      {session.deviceInfo.browser} trÃªn {session.deviceInfo.os}
                    &amp;lt;/h4&amp;gt;
                    {session.isCurrent &amp;amp;&amp;amp; (
                      &amp;lt;span className=&amp;quot;px-2 py-0.5 bg-success text-success-foreground text-xs rounded-full&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
                        {t(&amp;#039;current&amp;#039;)}
                      &amp;lt;/span&amp;gt;
                    )}
                  &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;

                  &amp;lt;div className=&amp;quot;mt-2 text-sm text-muted-foreground&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
                    {formatRelativeTime(session.createdAt, locale)}
                  &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
                &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;

                {!session.isCurrent &amp;amp;&amp;amp; (
                  &amp;lt;Button
                    onClick={() =&amp;gt; revokeMutation.mutate(session.id)}
                    disabled={revokeMutation.isPending}
                    variant=&amp;quot;ghost&amp;quot;
                    size=&amp;quot;sm&amp;quot;
                    className=&amp;quot;h-auto py-1 px-2 text-muted-foreground hover:text-foreground&amp;quot;
                  &amp;gt;
                    {t(&amp;#039;revoke&amp;#039;)}
                  &amp;lt;/Button&amp;gt;
                )}
              &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
            &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
          );
        })}
      &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;

      {/* Revoke All Confirmation Modal */}
      {showRevokeAll &amp;amp;&amp;amp; (
        &amp;lt;div
          className=&amp;quot;fixed inset-0 z-50 flex items-center justify-center bg-foreground/50 backdrop-blur-sm cursor-pointer&amp;quot;
          onClick={() =&amp;gt; setShowRevokeAll(false)}
        &amp;gt;
          &amp;lt;div

                fullWidth
              &amp;gt;
                {revokeAllMutation.isPending ? t(&amp;#039;revokeAllConfirm.revoking&amp;#039;) : t(&amp;#039;revokeAllConfirm.confirm&amp;#039;)}
              &amp;lt;/Button&amp;gt;
              &amp;lt;Button

                variant=&amp;quot;secondary&amp;quot;
                fullWidth
              &amp;gt;
                {t(&amp;#039;revokeAllConfirm.cancel&amp;#039;)}
              &amp;lt;/Button&amp;gt;
            &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;

            {revokeAllMutation.error &amp;amp;&amp;amp; (
              &amp;lt;p className=&amp;quot;text-sm text-error mt-3&amp;quot;&amp;gt;{revokeAllMutation.error.message}&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
            )}
          &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
        &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
      )}
    &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
  );
}
```

```ts
&amp;#039;use server&amp;#039;;

import { db } from &amp;#039;@/lib/db-ws&amp;#039;; // WebSocket driver - supports transactions
import { db as dbHttp } from &amp;#039;@/lib/db-http&amp;#039;; // HTTP driver - faster for single queries
import { users, accounts, sessions, userProfiles, userSecrets } from &amp;#039;@/db/drizzle&amp;#039;;
import { eq, and } from &amp;#039;drizzle-orm&amp;#039;;
import { generateSessionToken } from &amp;#039;@/utils/crypto&amp;#039;;
import { setSessionCookie, getSessionCookie, deleteSessionCookie } from &amp;#039;@/utils/cookies&amp;#039;;
import { generateUniqueUsername } from &amp;#039;@/utils/nanoid&amp;#039;;
import { getClientIp } from &amp;#039;@/utils/ip&amp;#039;;
import { hashPassword, verifyPassword } from &amp;#039;@/utils/password&amp;#039;;
import {
  buildGoogleOAuthURL,
  buildFacebookOAuthURL,
  exchangeCodeForTokens,
  exchangeFacebookCodeForTokens,
  getGoogleUserInfo,
  getFacebookUserInfo,
  shouldRenewSession,
} from &amp;#039;./utils&amp;#039;;
import {
  emailPasswordLoginSchema,
  createPasswordSchema,
} from &amp;#039;./schemas&amp;#039;;
import { headers } from &amp;#039;next/headers&amp;#039;;
import { cache } from &amp;#039;react&amp;#039;;
import { getLocale } from &amp;#039;next-intl/server&amp;#039;;
import { after } from &amp;#039;next/server&amp;#039;;
import { sql, gt, asc } from &amp;#039;drizzle-orm&amp;#039;;

// Session limit constant
const MAX_SESSIONS_PER_USER = 5;

/**
 * Create session with device limit enforcement (max 5 devices)
 * Automatically deletes oldest session if limit is reached
 * Silent operation - no notification to user
 */
async function createSessionWithLimit(params: {
  userId: number;
  ipAddress: string | null;
  userAgent: string | null;
}): Promise&amp;lt;string&amp;gt; {
  const sessionToken = generateSessionToken();
  const expiresAt = new Date(Date.now() + 30 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000); // 30 days

  await db.transaction(async (tx) =&amp;gt; {
    // 1. Count active sessions for this user
    const [{ count }] = await tx
      .select({ count: sql&amp;lt;number&amp;gt;`cast(count(*) as integer)` })
      .from(sessions)
      .where(and(
        eq(sessions.userId, params.userId),
        gt(sessions.expiresAt, new Date())
      ));

    // 2. If at limit, delete oldest session (silent)
    if (count &amp;gt;= MAX_SESSIONS_PER_USER) {
      const [oldestSession] = await tx
        .select({ id: sessions.id })
        .from(sessions)
        .where(and(
          eq(sessions.userId, params.userId),
          gt(sessions.expiresAt, new Date())
        ))
        .orderBy(asc(sessions.createdAt))
        .limit(1);

      if (oldestSession) {
        await tx
          .delete(sessions)
          .where(eq(sessions.id, oldestSession.id));
      }
    }

    // 3. Create new session
    await tx.insert(sessions).values({
      userId: params.userId,
      sessionToken,
      expiresAt,
      ipAddress: params.ipAddress,
      userAgent: params.userAgent,
    });
  });

  return sessionToken;
}

/**
 * Get Google OAuth authorization URL
 */
export async function getGoogleAuthUrl() {
  const { url, state } = buildGoogleOAuthURL();
  return { url, state };
}

/**
 * Get Facebook OAuth authorization URL
 */
export async function getFacebookAuthUrl() {
  const { url, state } = buildFacebookOAuthURL();
  return { url, state };
}

/**
 * Handle Google OAuth callback
 * Exchange code for tokens, create/update user and account, create session
 */
export async function handleGoogleCallback(code: string) {
  try {
    // 1. Exchange code for tokens
    const tokens = await exchangeCodeForTokens(code);
    
    // 2. Get user info from Google
    const googleUser = await getGoogleUserInfo(tokens.access_token);
    
    // 3. Find or create user + account (BATCH TRANSACTION with Account Linking)
    const result = await db.transaction(async (tx) =&amp;gt; {
      // Check if Google account exists
      const account = await tx.query.accounts.findFirst({
        where: and(
          eq(accounts.provider, &amp;#039;google&amp;#039;),
          eq(accounts.providerAccountId, googleUser.sub)
        ),
        with: { user: true },
      });
      
      let user;
      
      if (account) {
        // Existing Google account - update info
        user = account.user;
        
        // Only update emailVerified if it&amp;#039;s new information
        if (googleUser.email_verified &amp;amp;&amp;amp; !user.emailVerified) {
          await tx
            .update(users)
            .set({
              emailVerified: new Date(),
              updatedAt: new Date(),
            })
            .where(eq(users.id, user.id));
        } else {
           // Just update timestamp
           await tx
            .update(users)
            .set({
              updatedAt: new Date(),
            })
            .where(eq(users.id, user.id));
        }
        
        // Update refresh token if provided
        await tx
          .update(accounts)
          .set({
            refreshToken: tokens.refresh_token || account.refreshToken,
            providerMetadata: {
              email: googleUser.email,
              picture: googleUser.picture,
              verified: googleUser.email_verified,
            },
          })
          .where(eq(accounts.id, account.id));
      } else {
        // No Google account - check if email exists (Account Linking)
        const existingUser = await tx.query.users.findFirst({
          where: eq(users.email, googleUser.email),
        });
        
        if (existingUser) {
          // Email exists from another provider - link Google account
          user = existingUser;
          
          // Update user info with Google data ONLY if fields are missing
          // This prevents overwriting existing profile data from the original provider
          const updates: Partial&amp;lt;typeof users.$inferInsert&amp;gt; = {
            updatedAt: new Date(),
          };

          if (!user.name) {
            updates.name = googleUser.name;
          }
          if (!user.image) {
            updates.image = googleUser.picture;
          }
          if (!user.emailVerified &amp;amp;&amp;amp; googleUser.email_verified) {
            updates.emailVerified = new Date();
          }

          if (Object.keys(updates).length &amp;gt; 1) { // updatedAt is always there
             await tx
            .update(users)
            .set(updates)
            .where(eq(users.id, user.id));
          }
          
          // Create new Google account linked to existing user
          await tx.insert(accounts).values({
            userId: user.id,
            type: &amp;#039;oauth&amp;#039;,
            provider: &amp;#039;google&amp;#039;,
            providerAccountId: googleUser.sub,
            refreshToken: tokens.refresh_token,
            providerMetadata: {
              email: googleUser.email,
              picture: googleUser.picture,
              verified: googleUser.email_verified,
            },
          });
        } else {
          // Completely new user - create all records
          const username = await generateUniqueUsername();
          
          const [newUser] = await tx
            .insert(users)
            .values({
              email: googleUser.email,
              name: googleUser.name,
              image: googleUser.picture,
              username,
              emailVerified: googleUser.email_verified ? new Date() : null,
            })
            .returning();
          
          await tx.insert(accounts).values({
            userId: newUser.id,
            type: &amp;#039;oauth&amp;#039;,
            provider: &amp;#039;google&amp;#039;,
            providerAccountId: googleUser.sub,
            refreshToken: tokens.refresh_token,
            providerMetadata: {
              email: googleUser.email,
              picture: googleUser.picture,
              verified: googleUser.email_verified,
            },
          });
          
          // Create user profile
          await tx.insert(userProfiles).values({
            userId: newUser.id,
          });
          
          user = newUser;
        }
      }
      
      return user;
    });
    
    // 4. Create session with device limit
    const headersList = await headers();
    const ipAddress = getClientIp(headersList);
    const userAgent = headersList.get(&amp;#039;user-agent&amp;#039;);
    
    const sessionToken = await createSessionWithLimit({
      userId: result.id,
      ipAddress,
      userAgent,
    });
    
    // 5. Set session cookie
    await setSessionCookie(sessionToken);
    
    return { success: true };
  } catch (error) {
    console.error(&amp;#039;[OAuth] ERROR:&amp;#039;, error);
    console.error(&amp;#039;[OAuth] Error stack:&amp;#039;, error instanceof Error ? error.stack : &amp;#039;No stack trace&amp;#039;);
    return { 
      success: false, 
      error: error instanceof Error ? error.message : &amp;#039;Authentication failed&amp;#039; 
    };
  }
}

/**
 * Get current authenticated user
 * Implements rolling session logic
 * Wrapped in cache() to deduplicate requests in the same render pass
 */
export const getCurrentUser = cache(async function getCurrentUser() {
  const sessionToken = await getSessionCookie();
  if (!sessionToken) return null;
  
  const session = await dbHttp.query.sessions.findFirst({
    where: eq(sessions.sessionToken, sessionToken),
    with: {
      user: {
        columns: {
          id: true,
          email: true,
          name: true,
          image: true,
          username: true,
          role: true,
          publicId: true,
        },
      },
    },
  });
  
  if (!session || session.expiresAt &amp;lt; new Date()) {
    await deleteSessionCookie();
    return null;
  }
  
  // Rolling session logic: renew if &amp;lt; 7 days left
  if (shouldRenewSession(session.expiresAt)) {
    const newExpiresAt = new Date(Date.now() + 30 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000);
    await dbHttp
      .update(sessions)
      .set({ expiresAt: newExpiresAt })
      .where(eq(sessions.id, session.id));
    
    // Update local variable for return
    session.expiresAt = newExpiresAt;
  }
  
  return {
    session: {
      id: session.id,
      expiresAt: session.expiresAt,
    },
    user: session.user,
  };
});

/**
 * Logout - delete session and cookie
 * Optimized: Uses after() for non-blocking DB cleanup
 */
export async function logout() {
  const sessionToken = await getSessionCookie();
  
  // 1. Clear cookie immediately - User is effectively logged out
  await deleteSessionCookie();
  
  // 2. Clean up DB in background (Non-blocking)
  if (sessionToken) {
    after(async () =&amp;gt; {
      try {
        await db.delete(sessions).where(eq(sessions.sessionToken, sessionToken));
      } catch (error) {
        console.error(&amp;#039;[Logout] Background session cleanup failed:&amp;#039;, error);
      }
    });
  }
  
  // 3. Use locale-aware redirect
  const { redirect } = await import(&amp;#039;@/i18n/routing&amp;#039;);
  redirect({ href: &amp;#039;/learn/login&amp;#039;, locale: await getLocale() });
}

/**
 * Update password (simplified - no old password required)
 * User is already authenticated via session (OAuth)
 * Rate limited: Can only change password once every 5 minutes to prevent spam
 */
export async function updatePassword(formData: FormData) {
  try {
    // 1. Get current user
    const currentUser = await getCurrentUser();
    if (!currentUser) {
      return { success: false, error: &amp;#039;Báº¡n cáº§n Ä‘Äƒng nháº­p Ä‘á»ƒ thá»±c hiá»‡n thao tÃ¡c nÃ y&amp;#039; };
    }
    
    // 2. Validate input (only new password)
    const newPassword = formData.get(&amp;#039;newPassword&amp;#039;) as string;
    
    const validation = createPasswordSchema.safeParse({ password: newPassword });
    if (!validation.success) {
      return { 
        success: false, 
        error: validation.error.issues[0]?.message || &amp;#039;Máº­t kháº©u khÃ´ng há»£p lá»‡&amp;#039; 
      };
    }
    
    // 3. Get current password info and check rate limit
    const userSecret = await db.query.userSecrets.findFirst({
      where: eq(userSecrets.userId, currentUser.user.id),
      columns: {
        lastChanged: true,
      },
    });
    
    if (!userSecret) {
      return { success: false, error: &amp;#039;Báº¡n chÆ°a cÃ³ máº­t kháº©u. Vui lÃ²ng táº¡o máº­t kháº©u trÆ°á»›c.&amp;#039; };
    }
    
    // 4. Rate limiting: Check if last change was less than 5 minutes ago
    const now = new Date();
    const lastChangedTime = userSecret.lastChanged;
    const timeDiff = now.getTime() - lastChangedTime.getTime();
    const FIVE_MINUTES = 5 * 60 * 1000; // 5 minutes in milliseconds
    
    if (timeDiff &amp;lt; FIVE_MINUTES) {
      const remainingTime = FIVE_MINUTES - timeDiff;
      const remainingMinutes = Math.ceil(remainingTime / 60000);
      return { 
        success: false, 
        error: `Vui lÃ²ng Ä‘á»£i ${remainingMinutes} phÃºt trÆ°á»›c khi Ä‘áº·t láº¡i máº­t kháº©u`,
        remainingTime, // Send exact remaining time to client
      };
    }
    
    // 5. Hash and update new password
    const passwordHash = await hashPassword(validation.data.password);
    await db
      .update(userSecrets)
      .set({ 
        passwordHash,
        lastChanged: now,
      })
      .where(eq(userSecrets.userId, currentUser.user.id));
    
    return { success: true, message: &amp;#039;ÄÃ£ Ä‘á»•i máº­t kháº©u thÃ nh cÃ´ng&amp;#039; };
  } catch (error) {
    console.error(&amp;#039;[Update Password] ERROR:&amp;#039;, error);
    return { success: false, error: &amp;#039;ÄÃ£ xáº£y ra lá»—i khi Ä‘á»•i máº­t kháº©u&amp;#039; };
  }
}
```

### `src/features/auth/components/auth-guard.tsx`

```tsx
&amp;#039;use client&amp;#039;;

import { useAuth } from &amp;#039;@/features/auth/hooks&amp;#039;;
import { useRouter } from &amp;#039;@/i18n/routing&amp;#039;;
import { useEffect } from &amp;#039;react&amp;#039;;

/**
 * Client-side route protection wrapper
 * Redirects to login if not authenticated
 */
export function AuthGuard({ children }: { children: React.ReactNode }) {
  const { isAuthenticated, isLoading } = useAuth();
  const router = useRouter();
  
  useEffect(() =&amp;gt; {
    if (!isLoading &amp;amp;&amp;amp; !isAuthenticated) {
      router.push(&amp;#039;/learn/login&amp;#039;);
    }
  }, [isAuthenticated, isLoading, router]);
  
  // Show loading spinner while checking auth
  if (isLoading) {
    return (
      &amp;lt;div className=&amp;quot;flex items-center justify-center min-h-screen bg-background&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
        &amp;lt;div className=&amp;quot;animate-spin rounded-full h-12 w-12 border-4 border-primary border-t-transparent&amp;quot; /&amp;gt;
      &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
    );
  }
  
  // Don&amp;#039;t render children if not authenticated
  if (!isAuthenticated) return null;
  
  return &amp;lt;&amp;gt;{children}&amp;lt;/&amp;gt;;
}
```

```tsx
import { dehydrate, HydrationBoundary, QueryClient } from &amp;#039;@tanstack/react-query&amp;#039;;

export async function AuthPrefetch({ children }: { children: React.ReactNode }) {
```

### `src/features/auth/constants.ts`

```ts
/**
 * Application Routes Configuration
 * 
 * Centralized route constants for the application.
 * Update routes here instead of hardcoding throughout the codebase.
 * 
 * @example
 * import { ROUTES } from &amp;#039;@/features/auth/constants&amp;#039;;
 * router.push(ROUTES.DASHBOARD);
 */

export const ROUTES = {
  // Public routes
  ROOT: &amp;#039;/&amp;#039;,
  
  // Auth routes
  LOGIN: &amp;#039;/learn/login&amp;#039;,
  
  // Protected routes (require authentication)
  DASHBOARD: &amp;#039;/learn&amp;#039;,          // Main app entry point after login
  ACCOUNT: &amp;#039;/learn/account&amp;#039;,    // User account settings
  
  // API routes
  API: {
    AUTH_GOOGLE: &amp;#039;/api/auth/callback/google&amp;#039;,
    AUTH_FACEBOOK: &amp;#039;/api/auth/callback/facebook&amp;#039;,
  },
} as const;

/**
 * Helper to check if a route is public (doesn&amp;#039;t require auth)
 */
export function isPublicRoute(pathname: string): boolean {
  const publicRoutes = [
    ROUTES.ROOT,
    ROUTES.LOGIN,
    ROUTES.API.AUTH_GOOGLE,
    ROUTES.API.AUTH_FACEBOOK,
  ];
  
  return publicRoutes.some(route =&amp;gt; pathname === route || pathname.startsWith(route));
}

/**
 * Helper to check if a route requires authentication
 */
export function isProtectedRoute(pathname: string): boolean {
  return pathname.startsWith(&amp;#039;/learn&amp;#039;) &amp;amp;&amp;amp; pathname !== ROUTES.LOGIN;
}
```

### `src/features/auth/hooks.ts`

```ts
&amp;#039;use client&amp;#039;;

import { useQuery } from &amp;#039;@tanstack/react-query&amp;#039;;
import { authQueries } from &amp;#039;@/features/auth/queries&amp;#039;;
import { getCurrentUser } from &amp;#039;@/features/auth/actions&amp;#039;;

/**
 * Hook to access current authenticated user
 * Uses TanStack Query v5 for caching and automatic refetching
 * 
 * Optimized configuration:
 * - refetchOnMount: false - proxy.ts already validates session
 * - refetchOnWindowFocus: false - 5min staleTime is sufficient
 * - staleTime: 5min - balance between freshness and performance
 */
export function useAuth() {
  const { data, isLoading, error } = useQuery({
    queryKey: authQueries.current(),
    queryFn: getCurrentUser,
    staleTime: 5 * 60 * 1000,       // 5 minutes
    retry: false,                    // Don&amp;#039;t retry on auth failures
    refetchOnMount: false,           // Prevent duplicate fetch on component mount
    refetchOnWindowFocus: false,     // Prevent refetch on window focus (data rarely changes)
    refetchOnReconnect: false,       // Prevent refetch on network reconnect
  });
  
  return {
    user: data?.user ?? null,
    session: data?.session ?? null,
    isLoading,
    isAuthenticated: !!data?.user,
    error,
  };
}
```

```ts
import { generateState } from &amp;#039;@/utils/crypto&amp;#039;;
import type { GoogleTokens, GoogleUserInfo, FacebookTokens, FacebookUserInfo } from &amp;#039;@/features/auth/types&amp;#039;;

/**
 * Build Facebook OAuth authorization URL
 */
export function buildFacebookOAuthURL(): { url: string; state: string } {
  const state = generateState();
  
  const params = new URLSearchParams({
    client_id: process.env.FACEBOOK_APP_ID!,
    redirect_uri: process.env.FACEBOOK_REDIRECT_URI!,
    response_type: &amp;#039;code&amp;#039;,
    scope: &amp;#039;email,public_profile&amp;#039;,
    state,
  });
  
  return {
    url: `https://www.facebook.com/v18.0/dialog/oauth?${params}`,
    state,
  };
}

/**
 * Exchange Facebook authorization code for access token
 */
export async function exchangeFacebookCodeForTokens(code: string): Promise&amp;lt;FacebookTokens&amp;gt; {
  const params = new URLSearchParams({
    client_id: process.env.FACEBOOK_APP_ID!,
    client_secret: process.env.FACEBOOK_APP_SECRET!,
    redirect_uri: process.env.FACEBOOK_REDIRECT_URI!,
    code,
  });

  const response = await fetch(`https://graph.facebook.com/v18.0/oauth/access_token?${params}`, {
    method: &amp;#039;GET&amp;#039;,
  });
  
  if (!response.ok) {
    const error = await response.text();
    throw new Error(`Failed to exchange code for token: ${error}`);
  }
  
  return response.json();
}

/**
 * Get Facebook user info using access token
 */
export async function getFacebookUserInfo(accessToken: string): Promise&amp;lt;FacebookUserInfo&amp;gt; {
  const params = new URLSearchParams({
    fields: &amp;#039;id,email,name,picture&amp;#039;,
    access_token: accessToken,
  });

  const response = await fetch(`https://graph.facebook.com/me?${params}`, {
    method: &amp;#039;GET&amp;#039;,
  });
  
  if (!response.ok) {
    const error = await response.text();
    throw new Error(`Failed to fetch Facebook user info: ${error}`);
  }
  
  return response.json();
}

/**
 * Build Google OAuth authorization URL
 */
export function buildGoogleOAuthURL(): { url: string; state: string } {
  const state = generateState();
  
  const params = new URLSearchParams({
    client_id: process.env.GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID!,
    redirect_uri: process.env.GOOGLE_REDIRECT_URI!,
    response_type: &amp;#039;code&amp;#039;,
    scope: &amp;#039;openid email profile&amp;#039;,
    access_type: &amp;#039;offline&amp;#039;, // Get refresh token
    prompt: &amp;#039;consent&amp;#039;, // Force consent to get refresh token every time
    state,
  });
  
  return {
    url: `https://accounts.google.com/o/oauth2/v2/auth?${params}`,
    state,
  };
}

/**
 * Exchange authorization code for access and refresh tokens
 */
export async function exchangeCodeForTokens(code: string): Promise&amp;lt;GoogleTokens&amp;gt; {
  const response = await fetch(&amp;#039;https://oauth2.googleapis.com/token&amp;#039;, {
    method: &amp;#039;POST&amp;#039;,
    headers: { &amp;#039;Content-Type&amp;#039;: &amp;#039;application/x-www-form-urlencoded&amp;#039; },
    body: new URLSearchParams({
      code,
      client_id: process.env.GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID!,
      client_secret: process.env.GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET!,
      redirect_uri: process.env.GOOGLE_REDIRECT_URI!,
      grant_type: &amp;#039;authorization_code&amp;#039;,
    }),
  });
  
  if (!response.ok) {
    const error = await response.text();
    throw new Error(`Failed to exchange code for tokens: ${error}`);
  }
  
  return response.json();
}

/**
 * Get user info from Google using access token
 */
export async function getGoogleUserInfo(accessToken: string): Promise&amp;lt;GoogleUserInfo&amp;gt; {
  const response = await fetch(&amp;#039;https://www.googleapis.com/oauth2/v3/userinfo&amp;#039;, {
    headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${accessToken}` },
  });
  
  if (!response.ok) {
    const error = await response.text();
    throw new Error(`Failed to fetch user info: ${error}`);
  }
  
  return response.json();
}

/**
 * Parse User-Agent string to display device/browser info
 */
export function parseUserAgent(ua: string | null): string {
  if (!ua) return &amp;#039;Unknown Device&amp;#039;;
  
  // Mobile detection
  if (ua.includes(&amp;#039;Mobile&amp;#039;) || ua.includes(&amp;#039;Android&amp;#039;) || ua.includes(&amp;#039;iPhone&amp;#039;)) {
    if (ua.includes(&amp;#039;iPhone&amp;#039;)) return &amp;#039;iPhone&amp;#039;;
    if (ua.includes(&amp;#039;Android&amp;#039;)) return &amp;#039;Android Device&amp;#039;;
    return &amp;#039;Mobile Device&amp;#039;;
  }
  
  // Browser detection
  if (ua.includes(&amp;#039;Chrome&amp;#039;)) return &amp;#039;Chrome Browser&amp;#039;;
  if (ua.includes(&amp;#039;Firefox&amp;#039;)) return &amp;#039;Firefox Browser&amp;#039;;
  if (ua.includes(&amp;#039;Safari&amp;#039;)) return &amp;#039;Safari Browser&amp;#039;;
  if (ua.includes(&amp;#039;Edge&amp;#039;)) return &amp;#039;Edge Browser&amp;#039;;
  
  return &amp;#039;Desktop Browser&amp;#039;;
}

/**
 * Check if session should be renewed (rolling session logic)
 * Renew if less than 7 days until expiration
 */
export function shouldRenewSession(expiresAt: Date): boolean {
  const now = new Date();
  const daysUntilExpiry = (expiresAt.getTime() - now.getTime()) / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24);
  return daysUntilExpiry &amp;lt; 7;
}
```

### `src/features/i18n/hooks/use-cached-data.ts`

```ts
&amp;#039;use client&amp;#039;;

import { useQuery } from &amp;#039;@tanstack/react-query&amp;#039;;

/**
 * Example: Cache business data across language changes
 * 
 * When user switches language (VI â†’ EN), this data will NOT refetch
 * because queryKey does not depend on locale
 * 
 * Use this pattern for:
 * - User profiles
 * - User settings/preferences
 * - Session data
 * - Any data that is language-independent
 */
export function useUserProfile(userId: string) {
  return useQuery({
    queryKey: [&amp;#039;user-profile&amp;#039;, userId], // No locale dependency
    queryFn: async () =&amp;gt; {
      const res = await fetch(`/api/users/${userId}`);
      if (!res.ok) throw new Error(&amp;#039;Failed to fetch user profile&amp;#039;);
      return res.json();
    },
    staleTime: 5 * 60 * 1000, // 5 minutes - data stays fresh
    gcTime: 10 * 60 * 1000, // 10 minutes - cached for 10 min after last use
    refetchOnWindowFocus: false,
    refetchOnMount: false,
  });
}

/**
 * Example: Cache locale-specific content
 * 
 * This data WILL refetch when language changes because locale is in queryKey
 * 
 * Use this pattern for:
 * - Localized course content
 * - Translated articles
 * - Language-specific UI content
 * - Any data where translation matters
 */
export function useLocalizedContent(contentId: string, locale: string) {
  return useQuery({
    queryKey: [&amp;#039;content&amp;#039;, contentId, locale], // Includes locale - will refetch on language change
    queryFn: async () =&amp;gt; {
      const res = await fetch(`/api/content/${contentId}?locale=${locale}`);
      if (!res.ok) throw new Error(&amp;#039;Failed to fetch content&amp;#039;);
      return res.json();
    },
    staleTime: 5 * 60 * 1000, // 5 minutes
    gcTime: 10 * 60 * 1000, // 10 minutes
  });
}

/**
 * Example: Cache user&amp;#039;s learning progress (locale-independent)
 * 
 * Progress data doesn&amp;#039;t change with language, so we don&amp;#039;t include locale in key
 */
export function useUserProgress(userId: string) {
  return useQuery({
    queryKey: [&amp;#039;user-progress&amp;#039;, userId],
    queryFn: async () =&amp;gt; {
      const res = await fetch(`/api/users/${userId}/progress`);
      if (!res.ok) throw new Error(&amp;#039;Failed to fetch progress&amp;#039;);
      return res.json();
    },
    staleTime: 2 * 60 * 1000, // 2 minutes - more frequent updates for progress
    gcTime: 10 * 60 * 1000,
    refetchOnWindowFocus: false,
    refetchOnMount: false,
  });
}

/**
 * PATTERN SUMMARY:
 * 
 * 1. Locale-Independent Data:
 *    - queryKey: [&amp;#039;resource&amp;#039;, id] // NO locale
 *    - Result: Data persists across language switches
 *    - Examples: user profile, settings, progress, stats
 * 
 * 2. Locale-Dependent Data:
 *    - queryKey: [&amp;#039;resource&amp;#039;, id, locale] // WITH locale
 *    - Result: Data refetches when language changes
 *    - Examples: course content, articles, descriptions
 * 
 * 3. Configuration Tips:
 *    - staleTime: How long data is considered &amp;quot;fresh&amp;quot;
 *    - gcTime: How long inactive data stays in cache
 *    - refetchOnWindowFocus: false for most cases (save API calls)
 *    - refetchOnMount: false to use cache when component remounts
 */
```

### `src/features/image-processing/components/image-cropper.tsx`

```tsx
&amp;#039;use client&amp;#039;;

import { useRef, useCallback, useEffect, useState } from &amp;#039;react&amp;#039;;
import { useTranslations } from &amp;#039;next-intl&amp;#039;;
import { Button } from &amp;#039;@/components/button&amp;#039;;

interface ImageCropperProps {
  file: File;
  aspectRatio?: number;
  onConfirm: (croppedBlob: Blob) =&amp;gt; void;
  onCancel: () =&amp;gt; void;
  isOpen: boolean;
}

interface CropState {
  image: HTMLImageElement | null;
  scale: number;
  offset: { x: number; y: number };
  isDragging: boolean;
  dragStart: { x: number; y: number };
  cropBox: { x: number; y: number; width: number; height: number };
  minScale: number;
  maxScale: number;
}

interface TouchState {
  initialDistance: number;
  initialScale: number;
}

export function ImageCropper({
  file,
  aspectRatio = 1,
  onConfirm,
  onCancel,
  isOpen,
}: ImageCropperProps) {
  const t = useTranslations(&amp;#039;common&amp;#039;);
  const canvasRef = useRef&amp;lt;HTMLCanvasElement&amp;gt;(null);
  const containerRef = useRef&amp;lt;HTMLDivElement&amp;gt;(null);
  const animationFrameRef = useRef&amp;lt;number&amp;gt;(0);
  const touchStateRef = useRef&amp;lt;TouchState | null&amp;gt;(null);
  const isPinchingRef = useRef&amp;lt;boolean&amp;gt;(false);
  const [isProcessing, setIsProcessing] = useState(false);
  const [isImageLoaded, setIsImageLoaded] = useState(false);
  const [canZoomIn, setCanZoomIn] = useState(true);
  const [canZoomOut, setCanZoomOut] = useState(false);
  const [devicePixelRatio] = useState(() =&amp;gt; 
    typeof window !== &amp;#039;undefined&amp;#039; ? window.devicePixelRatio || 1 : 1
  );
  
  const cropStateRef = useRef&amp;lt;CropState&amp;gt;({
    image: null,
    scale: 1,
    offset: { x: 0, y: 0 },
    isDragging: false,
    dragStart: { x: 0, y: 0 },
    cropBox: { x: 0, y: 0, width: 0, height: 0 },
    minScale: 1,
    maxScale: 3,
  });

  // Draw canvas with pixel-perfect rendering
  const drawCropper = useCallback(() =&amp;gt; {
    const canvas = canvasRef.current;
    const state = cropStateRef.current;
    if (!canvas || !state.image) return;

    const ctx = canvas.getContext(&amp;#039;2d&amp;#039;, { 
      alpha: false,
      desynchronized: true 
    });
    if (!ctx) return;

    // Enable crisp rendering
    ctx.imageSmoothingEnabled = true;
    ctx.imageSmoothingQuality = &amp;#039;high&amp;#039;;

    // Clear canvas
    ctx.clearRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);

    // Draw image
    ctx.drawImage(
      state.image,
      state.offset.x,
      state.offset.y,
      state.image.width * state.scale,
      state.image.height * state.scale
    );

    // Draw overlay mask
    ctx.fillStyle = &amp;#039;rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.65)&amp;#039;;
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.rect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);
    ctx.rect(
      state.cropBox.x,
      state.cropBox.y,
      state.cropBox.width,
      state.cropBox.height
    );
    ctx.fill(&amp;#039;evenodd&amp;#039;);

    // Pixel-perfect crop border (fix anti-aliasing issues)
    const { x, y, width, height } = state.cropBox;
    // Round to whole pixels to prevent anti-aliasing artifacts
    const px = Math.round(x) + 0.5;
    const py = Math.round(y) + 0.5;
    const pw = Math.round(width);
    const ph = Math.round(height);

    // Get primary color from CSS variable for consistency with design system
    const primaryColor = typeof window !== &amp;#039;undefined&amp;#039; 
      ? getComputedStyle(document.documentElement).getPropertyValue(&amp;#039;--primary&amp;#039;).trim() || &amp;#039;oklch(0.58 0.21 29)&amp;#039;
      : &amp;#039;oklch(0.58 0.21 29)&amp;#039;;

    // Draw main border
    ctx.strokeStyle = primaryColor;
    ctx.lineWidth = 2;
    ctx.strokeRect(px, py, pw, ph);

    // Draw grid lines (rule of thirds)
    ctx.strokeStyle = &amp;#039;rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3)&amp;#039;;
    ctx.lineWidth = 1;
    
    // Vertical lines
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.moveTo(px + pw / 3, py);
    ctx.lineTo(px + pw / 3, py + ph);
    ctx.moveTo(px + (pw * 2) / 3, py);
    ctx.lineTo(px + (pw * 2) / 3, py + ph);
    ctx.stroke();
    
    // Horizontal lines
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.moveTo(px, py + ph / 3);
    ctx.lineTo(px + pw, py + ph / 3);
    ctx.moveTo(px, py + (ph * 2) / 3);
    ctx.lineTo(px + pw, py + (ph * 2) / 3);
    ctx.stroke();

    // Draw corner handles
    const handleSize = 24;
    const handleThickness = 3;
    ctx.strokeStyle = primaryColor;
    ctx.lineWidth = handleThickness;
    ctx.lineCap = &amp;#039;round&amp;#039;;

    // Top-left
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.moveTo(px, py + handleSize);
    ctx.lineTo(px, py);
    ctx.lineTo(px + handleSize, py);
    ctx.stroke();

    // Top-right
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.moveTo(px + pw - handleSize, py);
    ctx.lineTo(px + pw, py);
    ctx.lineTo(px + pw, py + handleSize);
    ctx.stroke();

    // Bottom-left
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.moveTo(px, py + ph - handleSize);
    ctx.lineTo(px, py + ph);
    ctx.lineTo(px + handleSize, py + ph);
    ctx.stroke();

    // Bottom-right
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.moveTo(px + pw - handleSize, py + ph);
    ctx.lineTo(px + pw, py + ph);
    ctx.lineTo(px + pw, py + ph - handleSize);
    ctx.stroke();
  }, []);

  // Setup canvas and load image with responsive sizing
  const setupCropper = useCallback((img: HTMLImageElement) =&amp;gt; {
    const canvas = canvasRef.current;
    const container = containerRef.current;
    if (!canvas || !container) return;

    // Get container dimensions
    const containerWidth = container.clientWidth;
    const containerHeight = container.clientHeight;
    
    // Calculate canvas size (responsive)
    let canvasWidth: number;
    let canvasHeight: number;
    
    if (containerWidth / containerHeight &amp;gt; aspectRatio) {
      // Container is wider
      canvasHeight = containerHeight;
      canvasWidth = canvasHeight * aspectRatio;
    } else {
      // Container is taller
      canvasWidth = containerWidth;
      canvasHeight = canvasWidth / aspectRatio;
    }

    // Limit max size
    const maxSize = 800;
    if (canvasWidth &amp;gt; maxSize) {
      canvasWidth = maxSize;
      canvasHeight = canvasWidth / aspectRatio;
    }

    // Set display size
    canvas.style.width = `${canvasWidth}px`;
    canvas.style.height = `${canvasHeight}px`;
    
    // Set actual size (considering device pixel ratio for sharpness)
    const dpr = devicePixelRatio;
    canvas.width = canvasWidth * dpr;
    canvas.height = canvasHeight * dpr;
    
    // Scale context
    const ctx = canvas.getContext(&amp;#039;2d&amp;#039;);
    if (ctx) {
      ctx.scale(dpr, dpr);
    }

    const state = cropStateRef.current;
    state.image = img;

    // Calculate crop box (centered, with padding)
    const padding = 0.1; // 10% padding
    const availableWidth = canvasWidth * (1 - padding * 2);
    const availableHeight = canvasHeight * (1 - padding * 2);
    
    // Crop box fills available space while respecting aspect ratio
    if (availableWidth / availableHeight &amp;gt; aspectRatio) {
      state.cropBox.height = availableHeight;
      state.cropBox.width = state.cropBox.height * aspectRatio;
    } else {
      state.cropBox.width = availableWidth;
      state.cropBox.height = state.cropBox.width / aspectRatio;
    }
    
    state.cropBox.x = (canvasWidth - state.cropBox.width) / 2;
    state.cropBox.y = (canvasHeight - state.cropBox.height) / 2;

    // Calculate scale constraints
    const minScaleW = state.cropBox.width / img.width;
    const minScaleH = state.cropBox.height / img.height;
    state.minScale = Math.max(minScaleW, minScaleH);
    state.maxScale = Math.min(state.minScale * 3, 5); // Max 3x zoom or 5x absolute

    // Smart initial scale - ensure crop box is filled
    const imgAspect = img.width / img.height;
    const boxAspect = aspectRatio;

    if (imgAspect &amp;gt; boxAspect) {
      // Wider image - fit height
      state.scale = state.cropBox.height / img.height;
    } else {
      // Taller image - fit width
      state.scale = state.cropBox.width / img.width;
    }

    // Ensure scale is within bounds
    state.scale = Math.max(state.minScale, Math.min(state.maxScale, state.scale));

    // Center image
    state.offset.x = (canvasWidth - img.width * state.scale) / 2;
    state.offset.y = (canvasHeight - img.height * state.scale) / 2;

    // Update zoom button states
    setCanZoomIn(state.scale &amp;lt; state.maxScale);
    setCanZoomOut(state.scale &amp;gt; state.minScale);
    setIsImageLoaded(true);

    drawCropper();
  }, [aspectRatio, devicePixelRatio, drawCropper]);

  // Load image using FileReader
  useEffect(() =&amp;gt; {
    if (!file || !isOpen) return;
    
    setIsImageLoaded(false);

    const reader = new FileReader();
    
    reader.onload = (e) =&amp;gt; {
      const img = new Image();
      
      img.onload = () =&amp;gt; {
        setupCropper(img);

      img.onerror = () =&amp;gt; {
        onCancel();
      };

      if (e.target?.result) {

      } else {

      }

    reader.onerror = () =&amp;gt; {
      onCancel();
    };

    reader.readAsDataURL(file);
  }, [file, isOpen, onCancel, setupCropper]);

  // Get pointer position (unified for mouse/touch)
  const getPointerPosition = useCallback((clientX: number, clientY: number): { x: number; y: number } =&amp;gt; {
    const canvas = canvasRef.current;
    if (!canvas) return { x: 0, y: 0 };

    const rect = canvas.getBoundingClientRect();
    return {
      x: clientX - rect.left,
      y: clientY - rect.top,
    };
  }, []);

  // Constrain offset to prevent cropping outside image
  const constrainOffset = useCallback(() =&amp;gt; {
    const state = cropStateRef.current;
    if (!state.image) return;

    const scaledWidth = state.image.width * state.scale;
    const scaledHeight = state.image.height * state.scale;
    const { cropBox, offset } = state;

    // Image must cover entire crop box
    offset.x = Math.min(
      cropBox.x,
      Math.max(offset.x, cropBox.x + cropBox.width - scaledWidth)
    );

    offset.y = Math.min(
      cropBox.y,
      Math.max(offset.y, cropBox.y + cropBox.height - scaledHeight)
    );

    // Don&amp;#039;t start drag if pinching

    e.stopPropagation();

    state.isDragging = true;
    const pos = getPointerPosition(e.clientX, e.clientY);

    if (canvasRef.current &amp;amp;&amp;amp; e.pointerId !== undefined) {
      canvasRef.current.setPointerCapture(e.pointerId);

  // Touch event handlers (for pinch zoom)
  const handleTouchStart = useCallback((e: React.TouchEvent) =&amp;gt; {
    if (e.touches.length === 2) {
      e.preventDefault();
      
      // Stop any ongoing drag
      const state = cropStateRef.current;
      state.isDragging = false;
      isPinchingRef.current = true;
      
      const touch1 = e.touches[0];
      const touch2 = e.touches[1];
      const distance = Math.hypot(
        touch2.clientX - touch1.clientX,
        touch2.clientY - touch1.clientY
      );
      
      touchStateRef.current = {
        initialDistance: distance,
        initialScale: state.scale,
      };
    } else if (e.touches.length === 1) {

      isPinchingRef.current = false;
    }

  const handleTouchMove = useCallback((e: React.TouchEvent) =&amp;gt; {
    if (e.touches.length === 2 &amp;amp;&amp;amp; touchStateRef.current) {
      e.preventDefault();
      
      const touch1 = e.touches[0];
      const touch2 = e.touches[1];
      const distance = Math.hypot(
        touch2.clientX - touch1.clientX,
        touch2.clientY - touch1.clientY
      );
      
      const state = cropStateRef.current;
      const touchState = touchStateRef.current;
      
      const scaleFactor = distance / touchState.initialDistance;
      let newScale = touchState.initialScale * scaleFactor;
      
      // Clamp to min/max scale
      newScale = Math.max(state.minScale, Math.min(state.maxScale, newScale));
      
      // Get center point between touches
      const centerX = (touch1.clientX + touch2.clientX) / 2;
      const centerY = (touch1.clientY + touch2.clientY) / 2;
      const center = getPointerPosition(centerX, centerY);
      
      // Zoom towards center point
      const scaleChange = newScale / state.scale;
      state.offset.x = center.x - (center.x - state.offset.x) * scaleChange;
      state.offset.y = center.y - (center.y - state.offset.y) * scaleChange;
      state.scale = newScale;
      
      // Update zoom button states
      setCanZoomIn(newScale &amp;lt; state.maxScale);
      setCanZoomOut(newScale &amp;gt; state.minScale);
      
      constrainOffset();
      
      if (animationFrameRef.current) {
        cancelAnimationFrame(animationFrameRef.current);
      }
      animationFrameRef.current = requestAnimationFrame(drawCropper);
    }
  }, [getPointerPosition, constrainOffset, drawCropper]);

  const handleTouchEnd = useCallback((e: React.TouchEvent) =&amp;gt; {
    const state = cropStateRef.current;
    
    // If less than 2 touches remain, pinch is done
    if (e.touches.length &amp;lt; 2) {
      isPinchingRef.current = false;
      touchStateRef.current = null;
      
      // Apply constraints after pinch ends
      if (e.touches.length === 0) {
        constrainOffset();
        if (animationFrameRef.current) {
          cancelAnimationFrame(animationFrameRef.current);
        }
        animationFrameRef.current = requestAnimationFrame(drawCropper);
      }
    }
    
    // Final update of button states
    if (state.image) {
      setCanZoomIn(state.scale &amp;lt; state.maxScale);
      setCanZoomOut(state.scale &amp;gt; state.minScale);
    }
  }, [constrainOffset, drawCropper]);

  // Pointer move/up handlers
  useEffect(() =&amp;gt; {
    function handlePointerMove(e: PointerEvent) {
      const state = cropStateRef.current;
      // Don&amp;#039;t drag if pinching
      if (!state.isDragging || isPinchingRef.current) return;
      
      e.preventDefault();
      const canvas = canvasRef.current;
      if (!canvas) return;

      const rect = canvas.getBoundingClientRect();
      const pos = {
        x: e.clientX - rect.left,
        y: e.clientY - rect.top,
      };

      const dx = pos.x - state.dragStart.x;
      const dy = pos.y - state.dragStart.y;

      state.offset.x += dx;
      state.offset.y += dy;
      state.dragStart = pos;

      if (animationFrameRef.current) {
        cancelAnimationFrame(animationFrameRef.current);
      }
      animationFrameRef.current = requestAnimationFrame(drawCropper);
    }

    function handlePointerUp(e: PointerEvent) {
      const state = cropStateRef.current;
      if (!state.isDragging) return;
      
      state.isDragging = false;
      constrainOffset();
      
      // Release pointer capture
      if (canvasRef.current &amp;amp;&amp;amp; e.pointerId !== undefined) {
        canvasRef.current.releasePointerCapture(e.pointerId);
      }
      
      if (animationFrameRef.current) {
        cancelAnimationFrame(animationFrameRef.current);
      }
      animationFrameRef.current = requestAnimationFrame(drawCropper);
    }

    window.addEventListener(&amp;#039;pointermove&amp;#039;, handlePointerMove);
    window.addEventListener(&amp;#039;pointerup&amp;#039;, handlePointerUp);
    window.addEventListener(&amp;#039;pointercancel&amp;#039;, handlePointerUp);

    return () =&amp;gt; {
      window.removeEventListener(&amp;#039;pointermove&amp;#039;, handlePointerMove);
      window.removeEventListener(&amp;#039;pointerup&amp;#039;, handlePointerUp);
      window.removeEventListener(&amp;#039;pointercancel&amp;#039;, handlePointerUp);
    };
  }, [constrainOffset, drawCropper]);

  // Zoom functions
  const handleZoomIn = useCallback(() =&amp;gt; {
    const state = cropStateRef.current;
    if (!state.image) return;

    const canvas = canvasRef.current;
    if (!canvas) return;

    const newScale = Math.min(state.scale * 1.15, state.maxScale);
    if (newScale === state.scale) return;

    // Zoom from center
    const centerX = canvas.width / (devicePixelRatio * 2);
    const centerY = canvas.height / (devicePixelRatio * 2);

    const scaleChange = newScale / state.scale;
    state.offset.x = centerX - (centerX - state.offset.x) * scaleChange;
    state.offset.y = centerY - (centerY - state.offset.y) * scaleChange;
    state.scale = newScale;

    // Update zoom button states
    setCanZoomIn(newScale &amp;lt; state.maxScale);
    setCanZoomOut(newScale &amp;gt; state.minScale);

    constrainOffset();
    
    if (animationFrameRef.current) {
      cancelAnimationFrame(animationFrameRef.current);
    }
    animationFrameRef.current = requestAnimationFrame(drawCropper);
  }, [constrainOffset, drawCropper, devicePixelRatio]);

  const handleZoomOut = useCallback(() =&amp;gt; {
    const state = cropStateRef.current;
    if (!state.image) return;

    const canvas = canvasRef.current;
    if (!canvas) return;

    const newScale = Math.max(state.scale / 1.15, state.minScale);
    if (newScale === state.scale) return;

    // Zoom from center
    const centerX = canvas.width / (devicePixelRatio * 2);
    const centerY = canvas.height / (devicePixelRatio * 2);

    const scaleChange = newScale / state.scale;
    state.offset.x = centerX - (centerX - state.offset.x) * scaleChange;
    state.offset.y = centerY - (centerY - state.offset.y) * scaleChange;
    state.scale = newScale;

    // Update zoom button states
    setCanZoomIn(newScale &amp;lt; state.maxScale);
    setCanZoomOut(newScale &amp;gt; state.minScale);

    constrainOffset();
    
    if (animationFrameRef.current) {
      cancelAnimationFrame(animationFrameRef.current);
    }
    animationFrameRef.current = requestAnimationFrame(drawCropper);
  }, [constrainOffset, drawCropper, devicePixelRatio]);

  // Wheel zoom handler
  const handleWheel = useCallback((e: WheelEvent) =&amp;gt; {
    e.preventDefault();
    const state = cropStateRef.current;
    if (!state.image) return;

    const canvas = canvasRef.current;
    if (!canvas) return;

    const rect = canvas.getBoundingClientRect();
    const pos = {
      x: e.clientX - rect.left,
      y: e.clientY - rect.top,
    };

    const ZOOM_SENSITIVITY = 1.08;
    const delta = e.deltaY &amp;gt; 0 ? 1 / ZOOM_SENSITIVITY : ZOOM_SENSITIVITY;
    let newScale = state.scale * delta;
    
    // Clamp to min/max
    newScale = Math.max(state.minScale, Math.min(state.maxScale, newScale));
    if (newScale === state.scale) return;

    // Zoom towards cursor position
    const scaleChange = newScale / state.scale;
    state.offset.x = pos.x - (pos.x - state.offset.x) * scaleChange;
    state.offset.y = pos.y - (pos.y - state.offset.y) * scaleChange;
    state.scale = newScale;

    // Update zoom button states
    setCanZoomIn(newScale &amp;lt; state.maxScale);
    setCanZoomOut(newScale &amp;gt; state.minScale);

    constrainOffset();
    
    if (animationFrameRef.current) {
      cancelAnimationFrame(animationFrameRef.current);
    }
    animationFrameRef.current = requestAnimationFrame(drawCropper);
  }, [constrainOffset, drawCropper]);

  // Attach wheel listener
  useEffect(() =&amp;gt; {
    const canvas = canvasRef.current;
    if (!canvas) return;

    canvas.addEventListener(&amp;#039;wheel&amp;#039;, handleWheel, { passive: false });
    return () =&amp;gt; canvas.removeEventListener(&amp;#039;wheel&amp;#039;, handleWheel);
  }, [handleWheel]);

  // Attach touch listeners with passive: false to prevent scroll during pinch
  useEffect(() =&amp;gt; {
    const canvas = canvasRef.current;
    if (!canvas) return;

    const handleTouchMoveNative = (e: TouchEvent) =&amp;gt; {
      // Prevent scroll if 2+ touches (pinching)
      if (e.touches.length &amp;gt;= 2) {
        e.preventDefault();
      }
    };

    canvas.addEventListener(&amp;#039;touchmove&amp;#039;, handleTouchMoveNative, { passive: false });
    return () =&amp;gt; canvas.removeEventListener(&amp;#039;touchmove&amp;#039;, handleTouchMoveNative);
  }, []);

  // Handle window resize
  useEffect(() =&amp;gt; {
    if (!isOpen) return;

    const handleResize = () =&amp;gt; {
      const state = cropStateRef.current;
      if (state.image) {
        setupCropper(state.image);
      }
    };

    window.addEventListener(&amp;#039;resize&amp;#039;, handleResize);
    return () =&amp;gt; window.removeEventListener(&amp;#039;resize&amp;#039;, handleResize);
  }, [isOpen, setupCropper]);

  // Cleanup animation frame
  useEffect(() =&amp;gt; {
    return () =&amp;gt; {
      if (animationFrameRef.current) {
        cancelAnimationFrame(animationFrameRef.current);
      }
    };
  }, []);

  // Handle confirm - extract cropped region
  const handleConfirm = useCallback(async () =&amp;gt; {
    const state = cropStateRef.current;
    if (!state.image) return;

    setIsProcessing(true);

    try {
      const { image, scale, offset, cropBox } = state;

      // Calculate source coordinates in original image
      const sourceX = (cropBox.x - offset.x) / scale;
      const sourceY = (cropBox.y - offset.y) / scale;
      const sourceWidth = cropBox.width / scale;
      const sourceHeight = cropBox.height / scale;

      // Create output canvas with proper sizing
      const outputCanvas = document.createElement(&amp;#039;canvas&amp;#039;);
      const targetSize = 1200; // Target output size
      const outputAspect = aspectRatio;
      
      let outputWidth: number;
      let outputHeight: number;
      
      if (outputAspect &amp;gt;= 1) {
        outputWidth = targetSize;
        outputHeight = targetSize / outputAspect;
      } else {
        outputHeight = targetSize;
        outputWidth = targetSize * outputAspect;
      }
      
      outputCanvas.width = outputWidth;
      outputCanvas.height = outputHeight;
      
      const ctx = outputCanvas.getContext(&amp;#039;2d&amp;#039;, { alpha: false });
      if (!ctx) throw new Error(&amp;#039;Failed to get context&amp;#039;);

      // High quality rendering
      ctx.imageSmoothingEnabled = true;
      ctx.imageSmoothingQuality = &amp;#039;high&amp;#039;;

      // Draw cropped region
      ctx.drawImage(
        image,
        sourceX,
        sourceY,
        sourceWidth,
        sourceHeight,
        0,
        0,
        outputWidth,
        outputHeight
      );

      // Convert to blob
      const blob = await new Promise&amp;lt;Blob&amp;gt;((resolve, reject) =&amp;gt; {
        outputCanvas.toBlob(
          (b) =&amp;gt; (b ? resolve(b) : reject(new Error(&amp;#039;Failed to create blob&amp;#039;))),
          &amp;#039;image/png&amp;#039;,
          1.0
        );
      });

      onConfirm(blob);
    } catch (error) {
      // Silent error handling
    } finally {
      setIsProcessing(false);
    }
  }, [onConfirm, aspectRatio]);

  if (!isOpen) return null;

  return (
    &amp;lt;div className=&amp;quot;fixed inset-0 z-50 flex items-center justify-center bg-background/95 backdrop-blur-sm p-4 sm:p-6&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
      &amp;lt;div

        style={{ maxHeight: &amp;#039;95vh&amp;#039; }}
      &amp;gt;
        {/* Header */}
        &amp;lt;div className=&amp;quot;flex justify-between items-center px-4 sm:px-6 py-4 border-b border-border bg-card&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
          &amp;lt;div&amp;gt;
            &amp;lt;h3 className=&amp;quot;text-lg sm:text-xl font-semibold text-foreground&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
              {t(&amp;#039;imageCropper.title&amp;#039;)}
            &amp;lt;/h3&amp;gt;
          &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
          &amp;lt;button
            onClick={onCancel}
            disabled={isProcessing}
            className=&amp;quot;w-9 h-9 flex items-center justify-center rounded-lg text-muted-foreground hover:text-foreground hover:bg-muted transition-all duration-200 disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed&amp;quot;
            aria-label=&amp;quot;Close&amp;quot;
            type=&amp;quot;button&amp;quot;
          &amp;gt;
            &amp;lt;svg className=&amp;quot;w-5 h-5&amp;quot; fill=&amp;quot;none&amp;quot; viewBox=&amp;quot;0 0 24 24&amp;quot; stroke=&amp;quot;currentColor&amp;quot; strokeWidth={2}&amp;gt;
              &amp;lt;path strokeLinecap=&amp;quot;round&amp;quot; strokeLinejoin=&amp;quot;round&amp;quot; d=&amp;quot;M6 18L18 6M6 6l12 12&amp;quot; /&amp;gt;
            &amp;lt;/svg&amp;gt;
          &amp;lt;/button&amp;gt;
        &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;

        &amp;lt;div
          ref={containerRef}
          className=&amp;quot;flex-1 relative bg-muted flex items-center justify-center overflow-hidden&amp;quot;
          style={{ minHeight: &amp;#039;300px&amp;#039;, maxHeight: &amp;#039;65vh&amp;#039; }}
        &amp;gt;
          &amp;lt;canvas
            ref={canvasRef}
            className=&amp;quot;max-w-full max-h-full cursor-move touch-none select-none&amp;quot;
            onPointerDown={handlePointerDown}
            onTouchStart={handleTouchStart}
            onTouchMove={handleTouchMove}
            onTouchEnd={handleTouchEnd}
            style={{ 
              display: &amp;#039;block&amp;#039;,
              touchAction: &amp;#039;none&amp;#039;, // Prevent all browser touch gestures
            }}
          /&amp;gt;
          
          {/* Zoom Controls Overlay */}
          &amp;lt;div className=&amp;quot;absolute bottom-3 right-3 sm:bottom-4 sm:right-4 flex flex-col gap-2&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
            &amp;lt;button
              onClick={handleZoomIn}
              disabled={isProcessing || !canZoomIn}
              className=&amp;quot;w-11 h-11 sm:w-12 sm:h-12 rounded-full bg-card border-2 border-primary text-primary flex items-center justify-center hover:bg-primary hover:text-primary-foreground transition-all duration-200 shadow-lg disabled:opacity-40 disabled:cursor-not-allowed active:scale-95&amp;quot;
              aria-label=&amp;quot;Zoom in&amp;quot;
              type=&amp;quot;button&amp;quot;
            &amp;gt;
              &amp;lt;svg className=&amp;quot;w-5 h-5 sm:w-6 sm:h-6&amp;quot; fill=&amp;quot;none&amp;quot; viewBox=&amp;quot;0 0 24 24&amp;quot; stroke=&amp;quot;currentColor&amp;quot; strokeWidth={2.5}&amp;gt;
                &amp;lt;path strokeLinecap=&amp;quot;round&amp;quot; strokeLinejoin=&amp;quot;round&amp;quot; d=&amp;quot;M12 4v16m8-8H4&amp;quot; /&amp;gt;
              &amp;lt;/svg&amp;gt;
            &amp;lt;/button&amp;gt;
            &amp;lt;button
              onClick={handleZoomOut}
              disabled={isProcessing || !canZoomOut}
              className=&amp;quot;w-11 h-11 sm:w-12 sm:h-12 rounded-full bg-card border-2 border-primary text-primary flex items-center justify-center hover:bg-primary hover:text-primary-foreground transition-all duration-200 shadow-lg disabled:opacity-40 disabled:cursor-not-allowed active:scale-95&amp;quot;
              aria-label=&amp;quot;Zoom out&amp;quot;
              type=&amp;quot;button&amp;quot;
            &amp;gt;
              &amp;lt;svg className=&amp;quot;w-5 h-5 sm:w-6 sm:h-6&amp;quot; fill=&amp;quot;none&amp;quot; viewBox=&amp;quot;0 0 24 24&amp;quot; stroke=&amp;quot;currentColor&amp;quot; strokeWidth={2.5}&amp;gt;
                &amp;lt;path strokeLinecap=&amp;quot;round&amp;quot; strokeLinejoin=&amp;quot;round&amp;quot; d=&amp;quot;M20 12H4&amp;quot; /&amp;gt;
              &amp;lt;/svg&amp;gt;
            &amp;lt;/button&amp;gt;
          &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
        &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;

          &amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
        &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;

        {/* Actions */}
        &amp;lt;div className=&amp;quot;flex gap-3 p-4 sm:p-5 border-t border-border bg-card&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
```

```ts
import { AnalysisResult } from &amp;#039;../types&amp;#039;;

/**
 * Analyze image characteristics for optimal compression
 * Logic preserved from UltraCompressPro v3.0.0
 */
export const analyzeImage = async (img: HTMLImageElement | ImageBitmap): Promise&amp;lt;AnalysisResult&amp;gt; =&amp;gt; {
  const sampleSize = Math.min(img.width, img.height, 200);
  
  let ctx: CanvasRenderingContext2D | OffscreenCanvasRenderingContext2D | null;

  if (typeof OffscreenCanvas !== &amp;#039;undefined&amp;#039;) {
    const canvas = new OffscreenCanvas(sampleSize, sampleSize);
    ctx = canvas.getContext(&amp;quot;2d&amp;quot;, { willReadFrequently: true }) as OffscreenCanvasRenderingContext2D;
  } else {
    const canvas = document.createElement(&amp;quot;canvas&amp;quot;);
    canvas.width = canvas.height = sampleSize;
    ctx = canvas.getContext(&amp;quot;2d&amp;quot;, { willReadFrequently: true });
  }

  if (!ctx) throw new Error(&amp;quot;Could not get canvas context&amp;quot;);
  
  ctx.drawImage(img, 0, 0, sampleSize, sampleSize);

  const imageData = ctx.getImageData(0, 0, sampleSize, sampleSize);
  const data = imageData.data;

  let edges = 0;
  let variance = 0;
  let transparentPixels = 0;
  let brightnessSum = 0;
  let saturationSum = 0;
  const colorFrequency = new Map&amp;lt;string, number&amp;gt;();

  for (let i = 0; i &amp;lt; data.length; i += 4) {
    const r = data[i];
    const g = data[i + 1];
    const b = data[i + 2];
    const a = data[i + 3];

    // Transparency
    if (a &amp;lt; 255) transparentPixels++;

    // Color frequency
    const colorKey = `${r},${g},${b}`;
    colorFrequency.set(colorKey, (colorFrequency.get(colorKey) || 0) + 1);

    // Brightness
    brightnessSum += (r + g + b) / 3;

    // Edge detection
    if (i &amp;gt; 0) {
      const diff =
        Math.abs(r - data[i - 4]) +
        Math.abs(g - data[i - 3]) +
        Math.abs(b - data[i - 2]);
      if (diff &amp;gt; 30) edges++;
      variance += diff;
    }

    // Saturation (simplified)
    const max = Math.max(r, g, b);
    const min = Math.min(r, g, b);
    if (max &amp;gt; 0) {
      saturationSum += ((max - min) / max) * 100;
    }
  }

  const totalPixels = data.length / 4;
  const uniqueColors = colorFrequency.size;
  const complexity = (edges / totalPixels) * 100;
  
  // Determine image type
  let imageType: AnalysisResult[&amp;#039;imageType&amp;#039;] = &amp;quot;photo&amp;quot;;
  if (uniqueColors &amp;lt; 256) {
    imageType = &amp;quot;graphic&amp;quot;;
  } else if (complexity &amp;lt; 5) {
    imageType = &amp;quot;simple&amp;quot;;
  } else if (complexity &amp;gt; 20) {
    imageType = &amp;quot;complex&amp;quot;;
  }

  const hasTransparency = transparentPixels &amp;gt; 0;

  return {
    recommendedQuality: calculateRecommendedQuality(complexity, imageType, hasTransparency),
    imageType,
    hasTransparency,
    suggestedFormat: suggestFormat(imageType, hasTransparency),
  };
};

const calculateRecommendedQuality = (complexity: number, imageType: string, hasTransparency: boolean): number =&amp;gt; {
  if (imageType === &amp;quot;graphic&amp;quot; || imageType === &amp;quot;simple&amp;quot;) return 0.85;
  if (hasTransparency &amp;amp;&amp;amp; complexity &amp;lt; 10) return 0.88;
  if (complexity &amp;gt; 20) return 0.75;
  return 0.8;
};

const suggestFormat = (imageType: string, hasTransparency: boolean): string =&amp;gt; {
  if (hasTransparency) return &amp;quot;image/png&amp;quot;;
  if (imageType === &amp;quot;graphic&amp;quot;) return &amp;quot;image/png&amp;quot;;
  
  // Check WebP support safely (OffscreenCanvas support check)
  if (typeof OffscreenCanvas !== &amp;#039;undefined&amp;#039;) {
      try {
          // OffscreenCanvas doesn&amp;#039;t have toDataURL, but convertToBlob
          // We can assume WebP is supported in modern browsers that support OffscreenCanvas
          return &amp;quot;image/webp&amp;quot;;
      } catch (e) {}
  } else if (typeof document !== &amp;#039;undefined&amp;#039;) {
      const isWebP = document.createElement(&amp;#039;canvas&amp;#039;).toDataURL(&amp;#039;image/webp&amp;#039;).indexOf(&amp;#039;data:image/webp&amp;#039;) === 0;
      if (isWebP) return &amp;quot;image/webp&amp;quot;;
  }
  
  return &amp;quot;image/jpeg&amp;quot;;
};
```

```ts
import { AnalysisResult } from &amp;#039;../types&amp;#039;;
import { canvasToBlob } from &amp;#039;./manipulator&amp;#039;;

/**
 * Intelligent binary search compression
 * Logic preserved from UltraCompressPro v3.0.0
 */
export const compress = async (
  canvas: HTMLCanvasElement | OffscreenCanvas,
  format: string,
  targetSize: number,
  analysis: AnalysisResult,
  baseQuality: number
): Promise&amp;lt;Blob&amp;gt; =&amp;gt; {
  // If no target size, just compress with base quality
  if (!targetSize || targetSize &amp;lt;= 0) {
    return canvasToBlob(canvas, format, baseQuality);
  }

  // Heuristic adjustments based on original code
  const range = 0.25;
  const boost = 0.05;
  const tolerance = 1.1;
  const maxIterations = 15;

  let minQuality = Math.max(0.1, baseQuality - range);
  let maxQuality = Math.min(0.98, baseQuality + boost);
  let bestBlob: Blob | null = null;
  let iterations = 0;

  while (iterations &amp;lt; maxIterations &amp;amp;&amp;amp; maxQuality - minQuality &amp;gt; 0.005) {
    const quality = (minQuality + maxQuality) / 2;
    const blob = await canvasToBlob(canvas, format, quality);

    if (blob.size &amp;lt;= targetSize * tolerance) {
      bestBlob = blob;
      minQuality = quality;
    } else {
      maxQuality = quality;
    }

    iterations++;
  }

  if (!bestBlob) {
    bestBlob = await canvasToBlob(canvas, format, minQuality);
  }

  // Advanced optimization check (if still too big)
  if (bestBlob.size &amp;gt; targetSize * 1.15) {
      const optimized = await advancedOptimize(canvas, format, targetSize, analysis);
      if (optimized.size &amp;lt; bestBlob.size) {
          return optimized;
      }
  }

  return bestBlob;
};

/**
 * Advanced optimization with progressive scaling
 * Used when standard compression fails to meet target size
 */
const advancedOptimize = async (
  canvas: HTMLCanvasElement | OffscreenCanvas,
  format: string,
  targetSize: number,
  analysis: AnalysisResult
): Promise&amp;lt;Blob&amp;gt; =&amp;gt; {
  const scales = [0.95, 0.90, 0.85, 0.8, 0.75, 0.7, 0.65, 0.6];

  for (const scale of scales) {
    const tempCanvas = scaleCanvas(canvas, scale);
    // Try aggressive compression on scaled canvas
    const blob = await canvasToBlob(tempCanvas, format, 0.5); // Aggressive quality

    if (blob.size &amp;lt;= targetSize) {
      return blob;
    }
  }

  // Last resort
  const finalCanvas = scaleCanvas(canvas, 0.5);
  return await canvasToBlob(finalCanvas, format, 0.1);
};

const scaleCanvas = (sourceCanvas: HTMLCanvasElement | OffscreenCanvas, scale: number): HTMLCanvasElement | OffscreenCanvas =&amp;gt; {
  const width = Math.round(sourceCanvas.width * scale);
  const height = Math.round(sourceCanvas.height * scale);
  let canvas: HTMLCanvasElement | OffscreenCanvas;
  let ctx: CanvasRenderingContext2D | OffscreenCanvasRenderingContext2D | null;

  if (sourceCanvas instanceof OffscreenCanvas) {
      canvas = new OffscreenCanvas(width, height);
      ctx = canvas.getContext(&amp;quot;2d&amp;quot;) as OffscreenCanvasRenderingContext2D;
  } else {
      canvas = document.createElement(&amp;quot;canvas&amp;quot;);
      canvas.width = width;
      canvas.height = height;
      ctx = canvas.getContext(&amp;quot;2d&amp;quot;);
  }

  if (!ctx) throw new Error(&amp;quot;Could not get canvas context&amp;quot;);
  
  ctx.imageSmoothingEnabled = true;
  ctx.imageSmoothingQuality = &amp;quot;high&amp;quot;;
  ctx.drawImage(sourceCanvas, 0, 0, width, height);

  return canvas;
};
```
